content: इह {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [इदं-ह इशादेशः <ls>P. V. 3. 11</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>] {@--1@} Here (referring to time, place or direction); in this place or case. {@--2@} In this world (<ab>opp.</ab> परत्र or अमुत्र); <ab>oft.</ab> with जगति; <ls>K. 35.</ls> {@--3@} In this case; in this book or system. {@--4@} Now, at this time. [<ab>cf.</ab> Zend {%idha%}].
